channel.title: About on KLOGG
channel.description: Recent content in About on KLOGG

item.title: Features
item.description: klogg inherited a lot of features from glogg. It: Runs on Unix-like systems, Windows and Mac thanks to Qt5 Displays search results separately from original file Supports Perl-compatible regular expressions Colorizes the log and search results Displays a context view of where in the log the lines of interest are Is fast and reads the file directly from disk, without loading it into memory Watches for file changes on disk and reloads it (kind of like tail) Is open source, released under the GPL klogg improves some basic features and brings new.
